title: Purdue CHEqI Team Providing Vaccinations at Gleaners & Indiana Chin Baptist Church Mobile Food Pantry
cleaned_text: The Center for Health Equity and Innovation (CHEqI) in the College of Pharmacy at Purdue University was established in 2020 to address the needs of populations who are historically underserved. CHEqI is committed to addressing upstream factors that address today's health disparities using collaborative community- and person-centered approaches. We are particularly focused on adolescent and aging populations, along with populations experiencing food and housing insecurity Please read our [Executive Summary](/sites/default/files/2022-CHEqI-Executive-Summary.pdf), which includes an overview of our mission, vision, and cornerstone efforts.
